description:
Enjoy your casual city rides carefree with Float! Adding comfort to every commute, Float is an anatomic bike saddle designed to relieve pressure thanks to a generous central cut-out. Add in the Slow Fit Foam padding that adapts to the shape of your body and guarantees more uniform weight distribution. This saddle is tailored to those who typically sit at an upright (90-degree) spine angle.

  • Slow Fit Foam is designed to fit the shape of your body. Its memory foam formulation with a slow, bounce-back effect provides immediate comfort and ensures a smooth feeling while riding
  • Enjoy a dry ride with a water-resistant saddle. This Selle Royal technology allows the saddle to be 100% sealed, even when exposed to heavy, wet weather
  • An ergonomic central cut-out designed to relieve pressure in the perineal area, making it ideal for the most sensitive riders. No pain, just gain on your rides
  • The Integrated Clip System positioned at the rear of your saddle will make the attachment of a Selle Royal saddle bag or other accessories an easy clip away
name: Selle Royal Float Relaxed Saddle - Unisex
